name: Default Records App
description: Adds default DNS records to zones based on zone name patterns.

fields.name: enableDefaultRecords
fields.label: Enable Default Records
fields.help: Enable or disable default records functionality

fields.name: defaultTtl
fields.label: Default TTL
fields.help: Default TTL value for records (in seconds)

fields.name: zoneSetMap
fields.label: Zone Set Map
fields.help: Map zone patterns to record sets (key = zone pattern, value = comma-separated set names)

itemProperties.name: name
itemProperties.label: Set Name
itemProperties.help: Unique name for this record set

itemProperties.name: records
itemProperties.label: DNS Records
itemProperties.help: DNS records in standard format (e.g., '@ 3600 IN MX 10 mail.example.com.')
